conversations.body_text: Hi Julia Seitz,  Click the Offset button in the software and follow the prompts in the pop-up window. This will reset the pedal’s original white signal to around 0%, then proceed to calibrate the pedals. Once calibration is successful, the blue progress bar should move from 0% to 100%, indicating normal operation. After that, you can enter the game to bind the pedals.
